name: Splash!!
description:
You play as someone named "Splash" your goal is to throw water bombs at many people as possible in only 60 seconds. You have a limited amount of water bombs so you get more by pressing [E] near a fountain.

I made this game during 48h for the One Minute Jam #7 for the theme "Underwater" and with the constraint "1 minute long Gameplay". 

All the assets and the code were made by myself.

Controls:
  • Move: WASD
  • Shoot: Left Click
  • Reload ammunition: E near a fountain
Music:
  • Main Theme by Minozar
Fonts:
  • Pixel Operator by Jayvee Enaguas (dafont.com/pixel-operator.font)
